00041 #define _uitextbutton_cpp

00053         TextButton::TextButton(ConstString& name, const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size, const Whole Glyph, String Text, UILayer* Layer)
00054             : Button(name,Position,Size,Layer)
00055         {
00056             IsText = true;
00057             GorillaButton = Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->createCaption(Glyph,GorillaRectangle->left(),GorillaRectangle->top(),Text);
00058             GorillaButton->size(GorillaRectangle->width(),GorillaRectangle->height());
00059             GorillaButton->background(Ogre::ColourValue(0,0,0,0));
00060             GorillaButton->align(Gorilla::TextAlign_Centre);
00061             GorillaButton->vertical_align(Gorilla::VerticalAlign_Middle);
00062         }
00063 
00064         TextButton::~TextButton()
00065         {
00066             Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->destroyCaption(GorillaButton);
00067         }
00068 
00069         void TextButton::SetVisible(bool Visible)
00070         {
00071             GorillaRectangle->SetVisible(Visible);
00072             GorillaButton->SetVisible(Visible);
00073         }
00074 
00075         bool TextButton::IsVisible()
00076         {
00077             return GorillaRectangle->IsVisible();
00078         }
00079 
00080         void TextButton::Show()
00081         {
00082             GorillaRectangle->Show();
00083             GorillaButton->Show();
00084         }
00085 
00086         void TextButton::Hide()
00087         {
00088             GorillaRectangle->Hide();
00089             GorillaButton->Hide();
00090         }
00091 
00092         void TextButton::SetText(ConstString& Text)
00093         {
00094             GorillaButton->text(Text);
00095         }
00096 
00097         String TextButton::GetText()
00098         {
00099             return GorillaButton->text();
00100         }
00101 
00102         void TextButton::HorizontallyAlign(UI::TextHorizontalAlign Align)
00103         {
00104             Gorilla::TextAlignment HA;
00105             switch (Align)
00106             {
00107                 case UI::Txt_Left:
00108                     HA = Gorilla::TextAlign_Left;
00109                     break;
00110                 case UI::Txt_Right:
00111                     HA = Gorilla::TextAlign_Right;
00112                     break;
00113                 case UI::Txt_Middle:
00114                     HA = Gorilla::TextAlign_Centre;
00115                     break;
00116                 default:
00117                     return;
00118             }
00119             GorillaButton->align(HA);
00120         }
00121 
00122         void TextButton::VerticallyAlign(UI::TextVerticalAlign Align)
00123         {
00124             Gorilla::VerticalAlignment VA;
00125             switch (Align)
00126             {
00127                 case UI::Txt_Top:
00128                     VA = Gorilla::VerticalAlign_Top;
00129                     break;
00130                 case UI::Txt_Bottom:
00131                     VA = Gorilla::VerticalAlign_Bottom;
00132                     break;
00133                 case UI::Txt_Center:
00134                     VA = Gorilla::VerticalAlign_Middle;
00135                     break;
00136                 default:
00137                     return;
00138             }
00139             GorillaButton->vertical_align(VA);
00140         }
00141 
00142         void TextButton::SetPosition(const Vector2 Position)
00143         {
00144             RelPosition = Position;
00145             Vector2 CurrDim = Parent->GetParent()->GetViewportDimensions();
00146             GorillaButton->left(CurrDim.X * RelPosition.X);
00147             GorillaButton->top(CurrDim.Y * RelPosition.Y);
00148             GorillaRectangle->left(CurrDim.X * RelPosition.X);
00149             GorillaRectangle->top(CurrDim.Y * RelPosition.Y);
00150         }
00151 
00152         Vector2 TextButton::GetPosition()
00153         {
00154             return RelPosition;
00155         }
00156 
00157         void TextButton::SetActualPosition(const Vector2 Position)
00158         {
00159             GorillaButton->left(Position.X);
00160             GorillaButton->top(Position.Y);
00161             GorillaRectangle->left(Position.X);
00162             GorillaRectangle->top(Position.Y);
00163         }
00164 
00165         Vector2 TextButton::GetActualPosition()
00166         {
00167             Vector2 Pos(GorillaButton->left(), GorillaButton->top());
00168             return Pos;
00169         }
00170 
00171         void TextButton::SetSize(const Vector2 Size)
00172         {
00173             RelSize = Size;
00174             Vector2 CurrDim = Parent->GetParent()->GetViewportDimensions();
00175             GorillaButton->left(CurrDim.X * RelSize.X);
00176             GorillaButton->top(CurrDim.Y * RelSize.Y);
00177             GorillaRectangle->left(CurrDim.X * RelSize.X);
00178             GorillaRectangle->top(CurrDim.Y * RelSize.Y);
00179         }
00180 
00181         Vector2 TextButton::GetSize()
00182         {
00183             return RelSize;
00184         }
00185 
00186         void TextButton::SetActualSize(const Vector2 Size)
00187         {
00188             GorillaButton->width(Size.X);
00189             GorillaButton->height(Size.Y);
00190             GorillaRectangle->width(Size.X);
00191             GorillaRectangle->height(Size.Y);
00192         }
00193 
00194         Vector2 TextButton::GetActualSize()
00195         {
00196             Vector2 Pos(GorillaButton->width(), GorillaButton->height());
00197             return Pos;
00198         }
00199 
00200         void TextButton::SetRenderPriority(UI::RenderPriority Priority)
00201         {
00202             Gorilla::RenderPriority RP;
00203             switch(Priority)
00204             {
00205                 case UI::RP_Low:
00206                     RP = Gorilla::RP_Low;
00207                     break;
00208                 case UI::RP_Medium:
00209                     RP = Gorilla::RP_Medium;
00210                     break;
00211                 case UI::RP_High:
00212                     RP = Gorilla::RP_High;
00213                     break;
00214                 default:
00215                     break;
00216             }
00217             GorillaButton->RenderPriority(RP);
00218             GorillaRectangle->RenderPriority(RP);
00219         }
00220 
00221         UI::RenderPriority TextButton::GetRenderPriority()
00222         {
00223             Gorilla::RenderPriority RP = this->GorillaRectangle->RenderPriority();
00224             switch(RP)
00225             {
00226                 case Gorilla::RP_Low:
00227                     return UI::RP_Low;
00228                     break;
00229                 case Gorilla::RP_Medium:
00230                     return UI::RP_Medium;
00231                     break;
00232                 case Gorilla::RP_High:
00233                     return UI::RP_High;
00234                     break;
00235                 default:
00236                     break;
00237             }
00238             return UI::RP_Medium;
00239         }
00240     }
00241 }
